scenes.background: Bob sighs and looks frustrated while Monica frowns at the screen during the video call.
scenes.description: 'We tried the guidelines again, but we're stuck. Can you give us more specific advice?'

options.text: I'll give you a more detailed step-by-step guide. Let's work through it together.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and social skill by offering to provide detailed help, but your self-regulation and motivation to maintain your leave were slightly lower.

options.text: I think you both have the capability to figure it out. Try to think outside the box.
options.analysis: You encouraged independent problem-solving, showing good self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation were lower.

options.text: I can help a bit more, but I need to get back to my leave soon. Let's make it quick.
options.analysis: You balanced your willingness to help with your need for time off, showing good perception and empathy, though your self-regulation was slightly lower.
